products.description: A royal decree of velvety rose and commanding oud, this candle embodies the quiet power of a monarch's private chamber, where luxury needs no proclamation.

products.name: Grandma's Oven
products.description: Grandma's oven at golden hour, crackling cinnamon, buttery crust, and the sweet sigh of baked apples, wrapped in the kind of love that never cools.

products.name: Tranquil Tropics
products.description: A refreshing and sweetly balanced candle with zesty lemongrass and juicy peach fragrance notes.

products.name: Barista Bliss
products.description: Warm and comforting, this candle blends rich espresso, creamy vanilla, and caramelized sweetness for the perfect coffeehouse vibe.

products.name: The Captain's Cabin
products.description: Rich mahogany and deep teakwood intertwine in this bold, woody candle smoldering, sophisticated, and irresistibly masculine.

products.name: Serene Sanctuary
products.description: Infused with the serene essence of Thai spas, this candle blends zesty lemongrass and warming ginger for an invigorating, spa-like escape at home.

products.name: Petal Patisserie
products.description: Velvety rose petals swirl with creamy vanilla in this candle, creating a dreamy, romantic escape soft, sweet, and utterly luxurious.
